question: Who won the 2017 French Open Men's Singles Tennis Tournament?
explanation: Spain's Rafael Nadal has won the 2017 French Open Men's Singles Tennis Tournament by defeating Swiss star Stanislas Wawrinka in final by 6-2, 6-3, 6-1 in Paris, France. Nadal has become the first player in the Professional arena to win the same Grand Slam title 10 times.
